item.title: Free Software Privacy
item.description: privacy is impossible without free software I have this image from the FSF that I love: https://static.fsf.org/nosvn/posters/privacy-free-software-sign.pdf https://www.fsf.org/bulletin/2020/spring/privacy-encryption
